I have been coming to this popeyes for years now. Never had an issue with the food. They always takes care of me with all the small things i ask them for. The employees are amazing. Most of them knows me very well..i take almost the same order every time so mostly they k ow what i want. The new management is very good too. The new manager is very easy to talk to and yes the food quality was good but now it more better and tastier . Old manager was good too..

There is one girl that works there, she normally is up-to-date and speed but I don‚Äôt know her name. The entire rest of the staff is nonexistent. And if that one girl isn‚Äôt there, the service is terrible. It is almost as if she knows everyone‚Äôs order. As far as upon entry there‚Äôs rarely ever chicken ready to be served. Services very slow. Most time you have to wait time could sit for 10 minutes or More. Me being totally honest, I don‚Äôt even think that the staff is following the directions on the preparation of the chicken. It just doesn‚Äôt even taste the same. The chicken is giving as many stars and as much energy as the staff is giving, which is very lackluster. I wish this Popeyes could do better. Popeyes Chicken is absolutely amazing! The crispy, flavorful coating and juicy meat make every bite unforgettable. Their famous chicken sandwich is a perfect mix of crunch and taste. Plus, the sides like Cajun Fries and biscuits are delicious. Fast service and consistently great quality keep me coming back. Highly recommend for anyone who loves fried chicken

No complaints from my end! Staff treats you with respect compared to other places, got my food quick and warm. This Popeyes is pretty clean too and has a lot of space. The person named by Anik I think, he's very friendly and understood what I wanted. Thank you!

I really enjoyed the food it‚Äôs fresh, crispy, and full of flavor. The customer service was also excellent. The staff were humble and attentive, willing to listen and help if any issues came up. Overall, a solid five-star experience without a doubt.

recently visited Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen and had a fantastic experience from start to finish. The food was fresh and flavourful .

The staff was friendly and the service was quick, even during a busy lunch hour. The restaurant was clean and well-maintained, which made the overall experience even better.
This Popeyes offers fantastic service! The staff is always friendly, welcoming, and quick, making every visit a great experience alongside their delicious food.

Horrible I ordered online and got there 30mins later nobody is around so I say hello and waited still nobody 5mins later a manager comes out I know because of the shirt she has on . She's so nasty like I'm boring her.  U give her My order # she said what's the name I tell her My order still isn't ready 30 mins later  . I'm not mad the order isn't ready because that means it's still hot I'm mad at how she's dealing with me. I asked her to write her name on my receipt she asked why. I said so I know who I'm complaining on and she said Im calling the police. I had2let her know Idk .Mind you all I did was ask her for her name to complain. Don't go here unless u want horrible service and the police called because you want to complain. I asked her to cancel my order she said NOO. HORRIBLE my biscuit was overly cooked and dry. Chicken wings was nuggets MAC N CHEESE TO MUCH OIL Should I keep going. Horrible service horrible food to top it off üòû!

Won't honor the app coupon. Staff at the register said that they don't have chicken available for the coupon but they do for their "big box" combo so that you pay more. So.. I need help explaining this.

6:15 pm on 5/13, check your staff.

Great place for food with family and friends. Im one of the most repeat customers of them. Everyone is welcoming there. Specially the manager Mirja. He literally can read customers minds. Food is very good. I love there wraps. Soo yumm and u can have it anywhere on the run.
Excellent service!  Kanij did very good job.

The food takes forever to come. Every time I've been here I had to wait at least 5 minutes (I've been here multiple times in the last 10+ years). The last time, the guy did not follow my order directions and the chicken wasn't all that great the last two times I went there (this was om the last 2 weeks).
Quick and fresh food , amazing service , clean environment for a late night bite or lunch
Staff is Very patient and attentive and the food is always fresh!
Great experience.. the girls were great ..Kani is so kind!..Shana was excellent!!!.. good food!!

Just ordered food from there. The  Boneless Wings special. The chicken is so salty. I couldn't really eat it. I had to trash it. On top of it, my biscuits were burned. The only thing that was eatable were the fries, even that,  was a bit cold. I'm really disappointed.  A waste of $16

I came tonight to pick up an order I had placed, which was a combo with chicken, mashed potatoes, and sweet tea. After picking it up and heading to my car, I noticed that they hadn‚Äôt given me the sauce or a spoon for the potatoes. I also tried the tea, and it was absolutely disgusting. It tasted like it had gone bad, and I‚Äôm not sure if it was expired or if they weren‚Äôt cleaning it properly. I had to throw it out entirely.

To make matters worse, they had placed the extra fries I ordered with the chicken. My friend eats halal, so she couldn‚Äôt even have them. She went back inside to request the sauce, spoon, and to let them know about the issues. The woman behind the counter, who was wearing a hijab, was rude and didn‚Äôt say anything. She didn‚Äôt even offer to replace the fries or the drink. When she did speak, she blamed the mistake on the combo, even though the fries weren‚Äôt included in the combo at all. Was so upset with everything I couldn‚Äôt even my meal.

This experience was very disappointing. I won‚Äôt be coming back, and I think the employees need to do a better job of fulfilling orders and providing good customer service
HORRIBLE. food is cold and dry‚Ä¶ biscuits hard, coke flat
One of the most favorite store is it. Food quality good. Service good . Nice lobby and clean. Most attractive thing is Ghost paper.
Fresh food, Good staff, great manager.
Poor customer service. Too slow. The cashier is rude.
Service too much slow. So unprofessional. Bad experience.

I ordered food from here and it was the worst chicken. I ever ate in my life. Or tried to eat? Should I say me? I could not eat it the chicken was hard The biscuits was so hard. You could have threw it up against the wall and nothing would have happened to it. It was just such a bad experience that. I will never ever order from this Popeyes again in my life. The Food, it's so bad then I had to throw it in the garbage
Service was great mango lemonade was so good

THE SLOWEST POPEYES EVERRRRR!!! I have been here several times and each time I order ahead for pick up I have to get to the store and wait. I‚Äôve ordered my food 30 minutes in advance and still have to wait at least 15 for my food once I get there. I have no clue what takes so long and why the entire point of ordering in advance goes out the window here but I hope this review helps this store speed on service.
Food was fresh service was so fast
They always serve fresh chicken

Convenient location with a parking spot.  So it was takeout. It's not fast but my order was correct. I bought the fried flounder for the time. It's bread-y but I think it was so you can really get that spicy Cajun. I would eat it again...just not anytime soon due to me always trying to avoid carbs.

The young man at the counter wasn‚Äôt familiar with the menu and tried to say my order wasn‚Äôt in the system when it was clearly on the board behind him. Then forgot to put sauce in the bag, so I had to come back in to the sauce and he tried to charge me for a second sauce. Incompetence and inconsideration for their patrons. I hope to see improvement for our local Popeyes.
I'm coming here everyday,they guy's are doing good behev with customers, there have good food service And every food are fresh. All managers are good.
